From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To configure a line as insecure, use the **insecure** command in line configuration mode. To disable this function, use the **no** form of this command.

ParaDef.Info: This commmand has no arguments or keywords.

Examples: In the following example, line 10 is configured as an insecure dialup line:
ExtraInfo: Use this command to identify a modem line as insecure for DEC local area transport (LAT) classification.
